instruction: Analyse the given article and identify main theme of it.
input:
Article: 
Climate change is one of the most pressing issues of our time, and experts across the world are scrambling to solve it. As temperatures continue to rise, sea levels will increase, weather patterns will change, and biodiversity will be at risk.
output: The main theme of the given article is the effects of climate change and its urgent need to be addressed. It discusses how climate change is leading to rising temperatures, higher sea levels, changing weather patterns, and increased risk to biodiversity.
